entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:00 AM MDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:00 AM MDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
